name: Henna by Ruhi

I say ‚Äúsimple‚Äù because they were so beautiful and intricate! She was so fun and kind AND so focused and efficient! Highly recommend working with Ruhi!!

Her designs are absolutely beautiful and she works with such ease which is very interesting to watch. All my friends and family loved her work!
Review 5: Roohi was amazing! My henna turned out wonderful. I asked her for elephants and she did then so beautifully even though she has never done them before. name: Salon Thread - Barrington
working_hours: Monday: 10 AM-7 PM, Tuesday: 10 AM-7 PM, Wednesday: 10 AM-7 PM, Thursday: 10 AM-7 PM, Friday: 10 AM-7 PM, Saturday: 10 AM-7 PM, Sunday: Closed
Review 1: Honestly, very kind tech. However, it took so long to have them done, she kept having to make adjustments and I felt a lack of confidence. I also feel as though they came out thinner than I had ever had them. Very kind, but not what I wanted or expected....

Review 4: Friendly and welcoming. Great service and thorough threading...never rushed. You can't beat the monthly plan. It is worth it for me since I have my full face threaded, including brows and lip, on a regular basis.  I can go as many times as I want for this service for 1 monthly fee. Highly recommend it.
Review 5: They are nothing short of amazing! This was my first threading experience and I couldn't have asked for better results! They listened to all my requests and gave great recommendations for future visits. My thin brows end up looking so much fuller and I don't have to fill them in with pencil anymore! I will never pick up a pair of tweezers again.
